Urgent hospital management to limit the risk of complications

question.question: What is the primary goal of urgent hospital management in the case of septic arthritis?
question.option_a: To treat the underlying infection with antibiotics only
question.option_b: To reduce pain and inflammation through non-invasive methods
question.option_c: To limit the risk of complications by administering antibiotics and performing joint aspiration
question.option_d: To perform surgery to remove the infected joint
